inclusion.criterion: scheduled for pelvic organ prolapse surgery and/or stress urinary incontinence surgery requiring a post-operative voiding trial
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Documented PVR of less than 100mL prior to surgery obtained either during a previous clinic visit or at the time of their preoperative urodynamics evaluation
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Dependent on catheterization to void preoperatively
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: quote: 'impossible for staff to pass a foley'

exclusion.criterion: Patient's undergoing fistula repair, sacral neuromodulation, urethral diverticulum/vaginal mass excision or mesh revision surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures. Severe bulbar urethral stricture requiring surgical intervention.
